    • Method Detail

      • getFileNameAndExtension

        public static java.lang.String[] getFileNameAndExtension​(java.lang.String filename)
        Utility method to split a file name into name (i.e. path) and extension
        Parameters:
        filename - the file name
        Returns:
        a String array: 0 is name/path, 1 is extension

      • getFilePathAndName

        public static java.lang.String[] getFilePathAndName​(java.lang.String fileFullPath)
        Utility method to split a full path into path - name and name (e.g. "./src/files/file1.txt" becomes ["./src/files", "file1.txt"]
        Parameters:
        fileFullPath - the path of the file in the file system
        Returns:
        a String array: 0 is path-name, 1 is name

      • loadFileFromFileSystem

        public static java.io.FileInputStream loadFileFromFileSystem​(java.lang.String fullPathOfFile)
                                                      throws java.io.IOException
        This methods reads a file and return its bytes
        Parameters:
        fullPathOfFile - the path name that will be used to get the file
        Returns:
        array of byte with the content. Null if the file doesn't exist
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there were exceptions while acquiring the input stream of the file

      • saveFileOnFileSystem

        public static java.lang.String saveFileOnFileSystem​(java.lang.String fullPathOfFile,
                                                    java.io.InputStream contentToSave,
                                                    int behaviourFlag)
                                             throws java.io.IOException
        save on file system content as byte array in a file
        Parameters:
        fullPathOfFile - directory where to save the file
        contentToSave - the content to save
        behaviourFlag - flag for behaviour if file already exists: - 0 overwrite the previous file - 1 create file appending a number at the end of the name - 2 do not write if file already exists
        Returns:
        the file path of the saved file if everything went well, null otherwise
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there were exceptions while writing the content of the file in the file system

      • getAllFilesWithGivenExtension

        public static void getAllFilesWithGivenExtension​(java.io.File directoryWhereToSearch,
                                                 java.util.HashSet<java.io.File> fileSet,
                                                 java.lang.String extension)
        Utility method to recursively get files inside a given directory
        Parameters:
        directoryWhereToSearch - the folder where to search for the files
        fileSet - the set in which all files will be inserted. it is needed as parameter because of recursion
        extension - the extension the file has to end with (e.g. "apk", "class", ...)
